channel.title: Cano's Personal Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Cano's Personal Blog

item.title: Books I Read in 2024
item.description:
Books I Read in 2024

Today is 2024 Dec 31, the last day of 2024.

Here, I present the books I read in this year and give some of my insights for each of them.

If you are looking for a book, I hope this helps.

It is the third book of the Harry Potter series.

In the past 3 years, I kept reading it at a speed of one book a year.

item.title: Starting My Blog Using Hugo Again
item.description:
I started my blog again using Hugo

I started my blog again, with Hugo, on Christmas Eve. (Actually, it’s just a coincidence.)

Several years ago, I already owned a blog, built with Hexo, decorated with a carefully chosen theme, and armed with a comment system called disqus.

My previous blog

Unfortunately, For about 8 years, I only wrote 3 articles on it. The reasons could be various, generally speaking, the following ones:
